spell.name: Sugar Surge
entries: You infuse a creature with humming energy. For the spell’s duration, the target gains a +10-foot bonus to its walking speed and {@damage 1d4} temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.
If the creature ends its turn with no temporary hit points from this spell, it gains a level of exhaustion when the spell ends.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the temporary hit points increase by {@dice 1d4} for every slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Friendly Flavor
entries: A waft of comforting cocoa envelops one humanoid of your choice within range. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the spell’s duration. While charmed, it regards you as a dear friend.
The effect ends early if you or your companions harm the target. A charmed creature has advantage on Charisma ability checks you make toward it.

spell.name: Frothy Burst
entries: A 15-foot cone of fizzing milk erupts from you. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw.
* **Failure:** The creature takes {@damage 3d6} bludgeoning damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
* **Success:** The creature takes half damage and isn’t pushed.

spell.name: Milk Shield
entries: A swirling barrier of condensed milk encases you. You gain a +2 bonus to AC and {@damage 5} temporary hit points for the spell’s duration.

When the temporary hit points are exhausted, the shield splashes outward. Each creature within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain an additional {@damage 5} temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Sweeten the Deal
entries: You toss a sugary incentive that melts in mid-air and lands on your ally’s tongue. The target regains {@damage 1d8 + @mod} hit points and gains advantage on its next Charisma (Persuasion) or Charisma (Deception) check made within 1 minute.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The healing increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Chocolate Wave
entries: A 15-foot cone of cocoa crashes from your cup. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw.
* **Failure:** The creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
* **Success:** The creature takes half damage and suffers no speed reduction.

entries.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
